refer-subtitle: Help us make a bigger impact, and gain a stake in our community
refer-desc: By sharing Socious with promising users and impact organizations, you're not just expanding our network, you're also accelerating change.
refer-learn-more-link: Learn more about our referral program and how to claim rewards.

refer-overview.track-referral: You can track your referrals and rewards using the table below.
refer-overview.claimed-color: Claimed rewards are displayed in green
refer-overview.unclaimed-color: Unclaimed Rewards are displayed in red
refer-overview.share-code-continue: Share your referral codes to continue to earn rewards.
refer-overview.share-code-start: Share your referral codes to start earning rewards.

refer-claim.wallet-not-installed-error: No Cardano wallet detected. Please install a compatible wallet.
refer-claim.wallet-not-connected-error: Failed to connect your {{walletName}} wallet. Please try again.
